name: GUBERNA ALUMNI
goal: GUBERNA is the preferred partner in Belgium for all corporate governance actors. The GUBERNA Alumni network constitutes a pool of more than 1400 dedicated professional board members, ambassadors of good governance with diverse backgrounds and varied profiles.  By participating in the public consultation on the review of the SME definition, the GUBERNA Alumni network wants to put the expertise and experience of its members at the service of advancing small and medium-sized business in Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Belangrijkste initiatieven worden vorm gegeven in ECODA, deze initiatieven staan ook op de website.
http://www.ecoda.org/
